EIN4360 - Facilities Planning and Work D.name: EIN4360 - Facilities Planning and Work Design

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: STA 3032 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduces fundamental concepts in facility planning, material handling systems and work analysis/design including work space/flow analysis, layout, warehousing operations and work measurement.

EIN4545 - Industrial Engineering Applica.name: EIN4545 - Industrial Engineering Applications in The Service Industries

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: ESI 4312 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Application of industrial engineering principles to improve the quality and productivity of service industries such as restaurants, banks, hotels, health care, etc.

Course Description.text: Fundamental principles of systems engineering and their application to the development of industrial complex engineered systems.

Course Description.text: Decision policies in manufacturing and logistics systems including forecasting, production planning, operations scheduling, deterministic and stochastic inventory control and project scheduling.
